The purpose of this vignette is to provide raw statistical results of all concordance indexes for pairwise comparisons of algorithms for Parkinson's Disease Dementia discussed in the source article.

```{r}
#| label: setup

# Load packages needed:
library(gt)
library(demcrit)

# Read the data:
data(concords)
```

```{r}
#| label: tbl-concords
#| tbl-cap: Random selection of twenty algorithm pairs.

concords |>
  dplyr::slice(sample(nrow(concords), 20)) |>
  gt_apa_table() |>
  fmt_number(decimals = 3) |>
  fmt_missing(missing_text = "-")
```
